overview: A very cool and rare Barbie doll testing video, with previews from Barbie's 1993 and then-upcoming 1994 ranges! We meet the designers behind Troll Barbie, Western Stampin' Barbie, Glitter Hair Barbie, Happy Holidays Barbie, My Size Barbie, Paint 'N' Dazzle Barbie, and more! We also get a look at Barbie's showroom ("Barbieland") where we meet other classics like Locket Surprise, Bedtime Barbie, Sun Jewel Barbie, and Camp Barbie. Really cool to see how much love and excitement used to be behind Barbie when Mattel still cared about their products!
title: Barbie Fashion Secrets
